.TourList {

}
.TourDates:first-child {

.TourDates {

}

}

}

}
.TourList::after {
    content: '';

    width: 18px;
    height: 18px;

}

<div class="custom_html">
<div class="tourbrd">
<h1>Yatra to the Holy Shrine of Mata Vaishno Devi</h1>
<p><span><a href="/" title="Home">Home</a> » <a href="/india-tour-packages" title="India Tour Packages">India</a> » <a href="/kashmir-tour-packages" title="Kashmir">Kashmir</a> » <span class="breadcrumb_last" aria-current="page">Vaishno Devi Yatra Package</span></span></p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="cmsmasters_row_673c3030c9f279_17409444" class="cmsmasters_row cmsmasters_color_scheme_default tourflexBox cmsmasters_row_top_default cmsmasters_row_bot_default cmsmasters_row_boxed">
<div id="tourflexBox2" class="cmsmasters_row_outer_parent">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_outer">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_inner">
<div class="cmsmasters_row_margin">
<div class="cmsmasters_column two_third">
<div class="custom_html tourIB1">
<div class="proGall"><img decoding="async" src="/wp-content/uploads/2023/03/vaishno-devi-tour.jpg" alt="Vaishno Devi Yatra Package" title="Vaishno Devi Yatra Package" width="750" height="450" loading="lazy"></div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB2">
<div class="tour-overview">
<div class="toBt"><i class="fa fa-file"></i> Tour Overview</div>
<p>The Vaishno Devi Yatra is considered as one of the holiest pilgrimage tours that any devout Hindu would crave to undertake at least once in his or her lifetime. The Journey to the abode of Mata Vaishno Devi also called Mata Vaishnavi or Mata Rani isn’t so easy because you have to trek a rugged course uphill to reach the shrine located at an altitude of 5300 ft. The shrine is within a cave that falls between the Trikuta and Bhagwati mountain ranges. Though the course is rugged and the journey tough yet you would be energized with the deep spirituality that pervades the air around and your mind, body and all the five senses would be rejuvenated by the Dhun of ‘Jai Mata Di’ to which the ambiance resounds. The shrine of Mata Vaishno Devi houses three Deities revered greatly in Hinduism; that of Mahakali, Mahalakshmi and the deity of Mahasaraswati.</p>
<p>Katra, a place 50 Kms from Jammu is the starting point of Vaishno Devi Yatra and the Vaishno Devi Yatra is supervised by the Jammu & Kashmir Government. From Katra one has to cover a distance of 13 Kms by trek to reach the holy shrine which is 5200 feet above sea level. All the pilgrims before embarking on the holy trek have to get their yatra slip from the Registration Counter near the Katra Bus Stop.</p>
<p><strong>About The Package</strong></p>
<p>Although there are several pilgrimage tour packages offered by the reputed Travel and Tourism Company Namaste India Trip, their Vaishno Devi Yatra Package is the one that comes with the best deals, offers and facilities for the ‘Yatris’. Hence your Darshan of the ‘Mata’ can be completed in a hassle-free and cost-effective way giving you the most fulfilling spiritual experience. Also if you have budgetary restrictions their customization facilities would help you complete the tour within your limited budget. So with Namasteindiatrip.com your Vaishno Devi Yatra would be completed to your utmost satisfaction, with you basking in the glory of Jai Mata Di and your entire ‘being’ responding to the freshness of the ambiance around.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="custom_html tourIB4">
<div class="tour-collection">
<h2 class="tourDBox"><i class="fa fa-bus" aria-hidden="true"></i> Vaishno Devi Yatra Tour Itinerary Package</h2>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details" id="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 1 :</span>Arrive Delhi On to Jammu</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="">
<p>Welcome to New Delhi. You will be greeted heartily by the Namaste India Trip tour operator who would help you visit all the key tourist attractions of the Dilwalo ka Shahar ‘Delhi’. In the evening you have to depart for Jammu for which you have two options; either take a flight or board a night train.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 2 :</span>Jammu to Katra (48 Kilometers)</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Once you are done with your breakfast, you can go for Jammu sightseeing. The Temples in the city, the Museum and its Fortresses with famous havelis and Mahals like Mubarak Mandi Mahal, Amar Mahal, Panch Peer, Bahu Fort are really worth paying a visit. The entire day would be spent in sightseeing. At about 6 pm you could hire a cab to take you to Katra and at Katra, you are to check into some Hotel for accommodation purpose.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 3 :</span>Katra to Mata Vaishno Devi Shrine and Back to Katra</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Next day early morning, after finishing your bath, wearing clean garments and with a pure heart and soul you start your trek for the Mata Vaishno Devi Shrine. It’s a 13 km trek uphill to reach the highest point where the shrine is actually located. People who have issues with walking the rugged course can avail options like Palanquins or Horses. On your way to the Shrine falls the Holy Cave called ‘Ardhkuwari’ where according to the myths Mata Vaishno Devi meditated for about Nine Months. The cave is some 6 Kms from Katra. After you have completed 9.5 Kms of your trekking you would reach a resting place called ‘Sanjhi Chhat’. After take rest for some time, resume your trek and walk until you reach the ‘Bhawan’. The journey is difficult. Your endurance and tenacity is put to test yet all tiredness, languor is brushed aside on reaching the Bhawan. Once you reach the Bhawan, show your Yatra slip and obtain your lot number readily. That’ll help you to complete the Darshan of the Mata in an orderly and methodical manner. Once your Darshan is over you are to go back to Katra.</p>
</div>
</div>
<div class="TourList">
<div class="TourDates">
<p class="TourDay_details"><span class="TourDay">Day 4 :</span>Jammu to Delhi</p>
</div>
<div class="TourInfo" style="display: none;">
<p>Hire a cab to Jammu. You can then go back to Delhi by Flight or you have options of bus journey or train journey too from Jammu to Delhi. With lots of Spiritual fulfillment and a heart brimming with piety, the Vaishno Devi Yatra ends here.</p>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div class="custom_html tourIB8">
<div id="popularBox8" class="tour-collection">
<h3><i class="fa fa-question-circle" aria-hidden="true"></i> FAQs for Vaishno Devi Yatra Package</h3>
<div class="panel-body">
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Are The Vaishno Devi Yatra Rules?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> To preserve the sanctity of the site, refrain from playing cards, smoking, or chewing betel (Paan) at Bhawan or en route. Do not paint, stick posters, or deface signboards, and refrain from littering the area. Fellow pilgrims are united in their belief in the Mata.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Are The Requirements For The Vaishno Devi Pilgrimage?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Carry gloves, scarves, and woollens if you are travelling during the winter. Wear comfortable shoes even if you don't intend to trek. Register: To participate in the Yatra, you must first register. This is available at the Yatra Registration Counter in Katra and is free of charge.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> What Can I Purchase From Katra?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> Kashmiri carpets, shawls, dry fruits, souvenirs, pherans, silverware, brassware, Pashmina shawls, wooden furniture, copperware, Kashmiri shawls, and Cashmere carpets are all available at Katra's Main Bazaar.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Month Is Ideal For Visiting Vaishno Devi?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> The Best Season the Yatra to Mata Vaishno Devi Ji's Holy Shrine is open all year. Peak season is during the summer months of May, June, and July, as well as the festival periods of Chaitra (spring) and Sharad-Ashwin (autumn) Navratras and New Year vacations.</p>
</p></div></div></div>
<div itemscope="">
<div class="click_ques" itemprop="name"><span>Q.</span> Which Is Vaishno Devi's Coldest Month?</div>
<div class="ans_sec" style="overflow: hidden; display: none;">
<div itemprop="text">
<p><span>A.</span> January is the coldest month and has the most snowfall. The maximum temperature remains around 11°C, while the minimum temperature can drop as low as -5°C. The weather in Mata Vaishno Devi in February is extremely cold, with temperatures dropping to 4°C.</p>
</p></div></div></div></div></div>
</div>
</div>

		<p><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-date"><input size="40" maxlength="400" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-text wpcf7-validates-as-required" aria-required="true" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Time of Travel*" value="" type="text" name="your-date" /></span><span class="wpcf7-form-control-wrap" data-name="your-trMess"><textarea cols="40" rows="10" maxlength="140" class="wpcf7-form-control wpcf7-textarea" aria-invalid="false" placeholder="Write a description of your tour so we can design the best package for you!" name="your-trMess"></textarea></span>
		</p>
		<div>
			<p><button type="submit" class="waves-bxt submitBtn2">SEND ME DETAILS <i class="fa fa-arrow-circle-right"></i></button><br />
<span class="infoBxs">We never share your Information.</span>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div><div class="wpcf7-response-output" aria-hidden="true"></div>
</form>

excerpt.rendered: Yatra to the Holy Shrine of Mata Vaishno Devi Home » India » Kashmir » Vaishno Devi Yatra Package Tour Overview The Vaishno Devi Yatra is considered as one of the holiest pilgrimage tours that any devout Hindu would crave to undertake at least once in his or her lifetime. The Journey to the abode...
